body.name: LONGRUF GPS Navigation for Car 7 Inch 2.5D Car GPS for Car 2024 Map Truck GPS Commercial Drivers Semi Trucker Navigation System 8GB 256M with Voice Guidance Free

features: 🚗【2.5D screen car navigation】7-inch, high-resolution touchscreen with a high resolution of 800 x 480 pixels, 8 GB MEMORY 256 MB RAM. The first 2.5D 7-inch curved curved screen with a wider viewing angle, a more visible screen and better light transmission, allowing clear mapping even in sunlight.

🚗【Smart GPS Navigation】①Support Postcode, Address, Coordinates, Favorite and POI Search. ②4 Routes Options: Fast/Green/Short/Easy. ③ Providing Intelligent Current Speed Camera Alerts, Sound Warning, Route Planning, Street Names Broadcast, Current Speed and Active Lane Assistant, Display Remaining Distance, telling Estimated Arrival Time.

🚗【Customized Navigation Routes】Smart GPS can customize your exclusive route according to your vehicle type, avoiding height and weight restrictions, traffic congestion routes, etc; GPS navigation supports multiple navigation modes - Truck, Car, Bus, Pedestrian, Cab, Bicycle, Emergency, etc., full for your diverse trips.

🚗【Multilingual Voice Navigation】: Car Truck GPS Navigation System has a Voice Steering System (multilingual Version). Receiving Upcoming Sharp Turn Alerts, Speed Limit Reminders and Height Limit Reminders, Red Light, and High-Speed Camera Voice Notification. If the Route is Wrong, the On-board Gps Navigation System Will Automatically Generate a New Route, Making It Faster, Safer, and More Accurate to Reach the Destination.Support English, German, French, Spanish, Italian.

🚗【Lifetime Map Updated for Free】 LANGRUF 7 inches GPS navigation has pre-installed with the 2023 latest North America Map, including USA Canada Mexico Maps, which has 2D / 3D map display. no internet connection required, ready to use. If you need to update North America Map, please contact us to download. (Downloadable but not pre-installed maps: Europe, Australia, South America, etc.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase for the price
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for several out of town medical appointments so I wouldn't have to use my phone for gps. I didn't want to spend alot but wanted something dependable. We loved it and had no issues with it. The screen is big, the voice is clear, it starts to warn you plenty of time before your turn or exit is coming up, and it picks up where we left off if we exited out of the MAP or turned it off. You do have to keep it plugged in for charging most of the time but that is not an issue for me. Overall so far it's a great purchase for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wouldn't pick up any signal, constantly defaulted to a different time zone (no matter how many times I reset the clock in Settings), randomly shouted "Turn left!" (even though it wasn't tracking a location). Final straw was when it told me "You are driving above the speed limit" (when I was doing 35 mph). It's simply an annoying backseat driver. I returned it immediately. Amazon warehouse has received it, and I'm STILL awaiting my refund! There must better navigators on the market. This one is a total waste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As above ...Clear and Easy
reviews.reviewText: I went to a larger version of my Garmin 50.....the older I get the bigger things have to be....I looked at reviews and this got the best ...I have to agree it fits perfectly in my Honda Pilot...it's easy and a clear image is so much better than my old one...I am sold...Mike Fox

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for...
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to like this product, but didn't. I've owned several TomToms, all I had to do was plug it in, turn it on and the screen came up, everything was visually intuitive and the touch screen worked. This thing comes with a booklet of instruction in 3-point type that needs a magnifying glass, so you have to jump through hoops to get the screen up. And the touch screen options, like volume control, don't work on the one I got. I'm returning it. Also no instructions for mounting, only option was a suction mount for the windshield, nothing for dash - and it seemed a couple of mounting parts were missing. Sounded like a good value worth trying, but I'll try the more expensive and reliable ones like TomTom or Garmin .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars better than garmin
reviews.reviewText: I do service work in the Tampa area where I spend almost as much time driving as I do working so it's nice to have a windshield mounted GPS. I've had a Tom Tom and a Garmin unit in the past and this one is superior over both. The bad reviews I read about this device are easily resolved in settings. My only complaint is that you have to periodically tighten the elbows in the over built mount. Hopefully it last longer than my Garmin which didn't even make it a year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Life Changing Device For Me!
reviews.reviewText: My husband suffered a stroke three weeks ago. This forced me to have to drive to strange cities in order to get him to his appointments with various doctors and specialists. I never had a good sense of direction, which is why I never drove much. I always depended on my husband to take me places. When the stroke hit, this forced me to be the driver. This GPS device is a life saver for me. I don't know what I would do without it. Now, if I hear that my husband has to go to such and such a place, I am no longer afraid to drive him because the GPS device will tell me exactly where to go. I was always afraid to drive because of my lousy sense of direction. If there was a detour in the road, I would panic. This device took the fear away from me completely and has liberated me from my self-imposed prison. Not only this, but I am able to get my husband to the places he needs to go. I will never be without this device ever again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The plug for the car is too large for the 2024 chevrolet malibu.
reviews.reviewText: Did not use until Christmas 2023. If it wasn't to late to return, I would. Traveled out of state during the holidays. Charged the gps before traveling and entered my first destination. Tried to plug in the outlet it was to large and did not fit. When I plugged in the usb it moving as if it was charging and would not let me use it. When unplugged from the car it would not let me put in a street address. It would not highlight the v. Thank God for the GPS on my I-Phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Some good....some unacceptable
reviews.reviewText: Nice heft and feel. I like the size and the screen is bright and I like the animation. It seems like a high quality product. The problem is twofold. First the GPS seems to be about 100 feet off. I often pull up to the street that I am going to turn onto and the voice says to turn in 100 feet, although I am right at the turn. Secondly, there are problems with the sound. About half the time the radio station is mute and then will break in with 10-15 seconds of sound and go mute again. Sometimes it never turns on. The sound of the GPS device is rather muffled and not clear and crisp like the radio and also it is much lower than the normal radio sound, so if I want to be able to hear the GPS instructions I have to set the sound of the radio at an uncomfortably high level. Occasionally the GPS does not issue any instructions regarding a turn. I chatted with the service dept. who was very friendly but the advice given did not help. I just went past the Amazon return time of 30 days, but I intend to contact the seller as they say they have a 90 day return policy so ultimately I believe I will have to return this.
